meanings.sent1: She is the cheerfullest person in our group.
meanings.sent2: The sunniest day of the year made everyone feel cheerfullest.
meanings.sent3: Even on a rainy day, her cheerfullest attitude brightens up the room.
meanings.sent4: His cheerfullest smile could light up even the darkest of days.
meanings.sent5: The cheerfullest puppy wagged its tail happily as it played in the park.

meanings.definition: In a cheerful or happy manner
meanings.sent1: She greeted everyone cheerfullest at the party.
meanings.sent2: The children played cheerfully and cheerfullest in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped cheerfullest as the sun rose in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed cheerfullest after the rain shower.
meanings.sent5: The music played cheerfullest, making everyone dance with joy.
